title: Google\Cloud\Translate\TranslateClient
name: TranslateClient
description:
Google Translate client. Provides the ability to dynamically translate text between thousands of language pairs. The Google Translate API lets websites and programs integrate with Google Translate API programmatically. Google Translate API is available as a paid service. See the Pricing and FAQ pages for details. Find more information at Google Translate docs.

Please note that unlike most other Cloud Platform services Google Translate requires a public API access key and cannot currently be accessed with a service account or application default credentials. Follow the before you begin instructions to learn how to generate a key.

examples.caption: The Translate client can also be instantianted directly.

params.name: config
params.description: Configuration Options.

params.name: config.key
params.description: A public API access key.

params.name: config.target
params.description: The target language to assign to the client. Must be a valid ISO 639-1 language code. Defaults to en (English).

params.name: config.httpHandler
params.description: A handler used to deliver Psr7 requests.

params.name: config.retries
params.description: Number of retries for a failed request. Defaults to 3.

methods.name: translate
methods.description: Translate a string from one language to another.

params.name: string
params.description: The string to translate.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration Options.

params.name: options.source
params.description: The source language to translate from. Must be a valid ISO 639-1 language code. If not provided the value will be automatically detected by the server.

params.name: options.target
params.description: The target language to translate to. Must be a valid ISO 639-1 language code. Defaults to the value assigned to the client (en by default).

params.name: options.format
params.description: Indicates whether the string to be translated is either plain-text or HTML. Acceptable values are html or text. Defaults to html.

returns.description: A translation result including a source key containing the detected or provided langauge of the provided input, an input key containing the original string, and a text key containing the translated result.

methods.name: translateBatch
methods.description: Translate multiple strings from one language to another.

params.name: strings
params.description: An array of strings to translate.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration Options.

params.name: options.source
params.description: The source language to translate from. Must be a valid ISO 639-1 language code. If not provided the value will be automatically detected by the server.

params.name: options.target
params.description: The target language to translate to. Must be a valid ISO 639-1 language code. Defaults to the value assigned to the client (en by default).

params.name: options.format
params.description: Indicates whether the string to be translated is either plain-text or HTML. Acceptable values are html or text. Defaults to html.

returns.description: A set of translation results. Each result includes a source key containing the detected or provided language of the provided input, an input key containing the original string, and a text key containing the translated result.

params.name: string
params.description: The string to detect the language of.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration Options.

params.name: options.format
params.description: Indicates whether the string to be translated is either plain-text or HTML. Acceptable values are html or text. Defaults to html.

returns.description: A result including a languageCode key containing the detected ISO 639-1 language code, an input key containing the original string, and in most cases a confidence key containing a value between 0 - 1 signifying the confidence of the result.

params.name: string
params.description: The string to detect the language of.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration Options.

params.name: options.format
params.description: Indicates whether the string to be translated is either plain-text or HTML. Acceptable values are html or text. Defaults to html.

returns.description: A set of results. Each result includes a languageCode key containing the detected ISO 639-1 language code, an input key containing the original string, and in most cases a confidence key containing a value between 0 - 1 signifying the confidence of the result.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration options.

returns.description: A list of supported ISO 639-1 language codes.

methods.name: localizedLanguages
methods.description:
Get the supported languages for translation in the targeted language.

Unlike Google\Cloud\Translate\TranslateClient::languages() this will return the localized language names in addition to the ISO 639-1 language codes.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration Options.

params.name: options.target
params.description: The language to discover supported languages for. Must be a valid ISO 639-1 language code. Defaults to the value assigned to the client (en by default).

returns.description: A set of language results. Each result includes a code key containing the ISO 639-1 code for the supported language and a name key containing the name of the language written in the target language.
